query.ejb-ql: SELECT MAX(f.sequence) FROM Filter AS f WHERE f.reportId=?1 AND f.companyId=?2
SELECT OBJECT(u) FROM Filter AS u WHERE u.reportId=?1 and u.companyId=?2
SELECT OBJECT(u) FROM Filter AS u WHERE u.reportId=?1 and u.companyId=?2 and u.isParameter = TRUE
SELECT OBJECT(u) FROM Filter AS u WHERE u.tableReference =?1 and u.columnReference =?2
SELECT OBJECT(r) FROM Report AS r WHERE r.employeeId=?1
SELECT OBJECT(u) FROM Column AS u WHERE u.reportId=?1 AND u.companyId=?2 ORDER BY u.sequence ASC
SELECT OBJECT(u) FROM Column AS u WHERE u.reportId=?1 and u.tableReference=?2 and u.companyId=?3 ORDER BY u.sequence ASC
SELECT OBJECT(column) FROM Column AS column WHERE column.reportId=?1 and column.companyId = ?2 and column.columnGroup IS NOT NULL ORDER BY column.columnGroup.sequence ASC
SELECT OBJECT(column) FROM Column AS column WHERE column.tableReference =?1 and column.columnReference = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(columnGroup) FROM ColumnGroup AS columnGroup WHERE columnGroup.companyId=?1 and columnGroup.columnId = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(totalize) FROM Totalize as totalize WHERE totalize.reportId = ?1 AND totalize.companyId = ?2 AND totalize.totalizeType <> -1
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM Chart as a WHERE a.reportId = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM Chart as a WHERE (a.valueXId = ?1 OR a.valueYId=?1 OR a.valueZId=?1) AND a.companyId=?2
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM FilterValue as a WHERE a.filterId = ?1 ORDER BY a.sequence ASC, a.pkSequence ASC
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM ReportRole as a WHERE a.reportId = ?1 and a.companyId =?2
SELECT OBJECT(ra) FROM ReportArtifact as ra WHERE ra.reportId = ?1
